objects.description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has used [GoldFinder](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0597) to perform HTTP GET requests to check internet connectivity and identify HTTP proxy servers and other redirectors that an HTTP request travels through.(Citation: MSTIC NOBELIUM Mar 2021)

external_references.description: Nafisi, R., Lelli, A. (2021, March 4). GoldMax, GoldFinder, and Sibot: Analyzing NOBELIUM’s layered persistence. Retrieved March 8, 2021.
